entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
